welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fort Bliss, the charming city known for its rich history, scenic views, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful place has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Paso International Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at El Paso International Airport serves as a hub for regional airlines and smaller aircraft.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggs AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Biggs AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
